S.FORM: == Ay-de-hua.Cen-na (kamu nu Hulam: 愛德華·詹納) == Ay-dehaw.cen-na (kamu nu Amilika: Edward Jenner,caypic-sipsiw mihcaan lima a bulad caypic a demiad- caywal-tulu a mihcaan cacay a bulad tunem a demiad) , FRS FRCPE,pangangan han ci Ayde-hau. Cin-na caay sa ci Cen-na, misaydan nu Ing-kuo, nikinkiwan atu ni cuduhan u tibeni atu sapihaymawan tu tibenian a nikasingangan, caypic-siwnem mihcaan lima a bulad malahciay nida tu libung a sapicucuk nu sapayuan u sayaway nu kitakidan a sapayuan, ci Cen-na tuni ka tukuh ayda pangangan han u (caay tu ka ala nu libung a laliwamaan). 愛德華·詹納(英文:Edward Jenner,1749年5月17日—1823年1月26日),FRS FRCPE, ". i ayaw ni Cen-na, tademaw u sapiala tu tibeni nu picucukan sakacaay ka ala nu libung, uyniyan a kawaw i tida i Cuon-kuo, Ing-tu atu Fea-cuo matenes ku nipidaydayan, nika sakabalihenawan, caay kaw silahciay. nika ni kinkiwan a sapatahekal ni Cen-na a tibeni tu sapicucuk kapah kuyda, maadih ku nika kapah, haymaw satu tayda i hekalan nu kanatalan, mapacuwah namin ku udip nu maudipay. Caysiw-walsep mihcaan kitakiday nu pulung nu padekuan mihapu, u tibeni itini i kitakidan malawpes mapatay tu. kawaw ni Cen-na a nikinkiwan tanektek tu , ladayen nida ci Lu-yi.Pase-de, Luopuo-te'.kehe' a tademaw mikilin aca tu duma a sapingaay tu imelang. . u mahida maudip 早年生活 ci Cen-na pilecuhan i caypic-sipsiw mihcaan lima a bulad caypic a demiad ni lecuhan i Ing-kuo Ke-luo-se-te'-pei-ke'-li' a buksi nu lumaan, i pilucuhan nida tu Ke-luo-se-te' micudad, dikud i Lun-tun a cacayan tu ci Lu-de-luo a misaydangan minanam tu sapisenataw tu bangesan. sadikuday taluma' aca i nalecuhan, i niyadu' satu malamisaydan. malaheci ku sakay niw-duo 發明牛痘接種術 tawya a Ingkuo u tademaw ku sasapalan mitaneng , kasilahecian mangalay miala tu i udipay a bena' nu imelangay, u adidiay a sapisenad nu katini' ku sapinanam i banges nu imelangay. i nanikinkiwan a imelangay nu tademaw caay kaw nu nikalalidan tu bala'an, sisa hatidaay tu nu tademaw caay tu ka hacica ku tahekalay nu ten-hua. uyniyan ni tanengan yadah henay ku la'cusay, u nitanengan a tademaw usitin-huaay a tademaw, sisa idaw ku mapatayay. nu nitanengan a tademaw kapahtu ku udip sa, nika amica ku nikakapah milalid tu tepalay a tademawan, sisa kanca aidaw ku laa'd sa. . tawyaay a niyadu' nu Ingkuo idaw ku nakamuan sa, anu namalalidtu tu niw-duo, acaay tu ka lalid tu ten-hua. nu mipuleciay tu cucu nu katalan a tataynaan nu tademaw namalaliday namin tu libungay tu niw-duo. ci Cen-na anu tatengan ku kamu nu i hekalay a tademaw, u niw-duo atu ten-hua u malecaday sa, anu mahida nanicucukan tu niw-duo taneng cucukan tu ten-hua u kapahay ku mahiniay sa. . nikahinian anipatahekalan, caypic- siwnem mihcaan lima a bulad caysip a dimiad, ci Cen-na malingatu tu mikinkiw tu niw-duo a kawawan. cinida micucuk tu niw-duo a kawawan, sakapahen nida ku nipibanaw tu katini' itidan nida i waluay a mihcaan nanay a wawaw ci Cen-muse. Faipu-se tu tusaay a abalaan, banaten nida paladuka, pacumuden nida tu niw-duo, metalaw asiten-hua. namalalid satu kida tatamaan a wawa tu niw-duo, enemay a lalipayan mangaay tu. nikuda ci Cen-na cucukan naca nida kida tatamaan a wawa tu ten-hua, alaw caay ka lalid kida tatamaan a wawa tu libungan, itini palutatengan cinida u niw-duo mikapah tu ten-hua macunus ku kapah nu udip. (James Phipps) . ci Cen-na matineng tu tuyu nipicucukan tu libung nikasilahecian, mangalay ci nida tu nika cacayan a demiad malawpes ku ten-hua i tini i kitakidan. tahsepi han nida masasuini namin misaicelang ku kitakiday a tademaw sadikuday malaheci tu, caysiw-walsep mihcaan ina ten-hua lawpes satu itini i kitakida. . duma a nipain其它貢獻 nipikinkiwan tu niw-duo a sacucuk, ci Cen-na u manamuhay miadih tu sakalihalay tu hekal a kesya-ciw. wawa nina tu-cun a ayam matineng mialaw tu duma nu ayaman a ti'kuk atu wawa nu duma a ayam micuduh patahekal, ci Cen-na tu ku makaadihay. nu nipihaymawan nida miadih, sisa ci Cen-na maadih nu Ing-kuo hun-ciw-sye-hua itida i caypic-walsiw mihcaan mala yen-se. .

== Ay-de-hoa.Cen-na (kamo no Holam: 愛德華·詹納) == Ay-dehaw.cen-na (kamo no Amilika: Edward Jenner,caypic-sipsiw mihcaan lima a bolad caypic a demiad- caywal-tolo a mihcaan cacay a bolad tonem a demiad) , FRS FRCPE,pangangan han ci Ayde-hao. Cin-na caay sa ci Cen-na, misaydan no Ing-koo, nikinkiwan ato ni codohan o tibeni ato sapihaymawan to tibenian a nikasingangan, caypic-siwnem mihcaan lima a bolad malahciay nida to libong a sapicocok no sapayoan o sayaway no kitakidan a sapayoan, ci Cen-na toni ka tokoh ayda pangangan han o (caay to ka ala no libong a laliwamaan). 愛德華·詹納(英文:Edward Jenner,1749年5月17日—1823年1月26日),FRS FRCPE, ". i ayaw ni Cen-na, tademaw o sapiala to tibeni no picocokan sakacaay ka ala no libong, oyniyan a kawaw i tida i Coon-koo, Ing-to ato Fea-coo matenes ko nipidaydayan, nika sakabalihenawan, caay kaw silahciay. nika ni kinkiwan a sapatahekal ni Cen-na a tibeni to sapicocok kapah koyda, maadih ko nika kapah, haymaw sato tayda i hekalan no kanatalan, mapacowah namin ko odip no maodipay. Caysiw-walsep mihcaan kitakiday no polong no padekoan mihapo, o tibeni itini i kitakidan malawpes mapatay to. kawaw ni Cen-na a nikinkiwan tanektek to , ladayen nida ci Lo-yi.Pase-de, Loopoo-te'.kehe' a tademaw mikilin aca to doma a sapingaay to imelang. . o mahida maodip 早年生活 ci Cen-na pilecohan i caypic-sipsiw mihcaan lima a bolad caypic a demiad ni lecohan i Ing-koo Ke-loo-se-te'-pei-ke'-li' a boksi no lomaan, i pilocohan nida to Ke-loo-se-te' micodad, dikod i Lon-ton a cacayan to ci Lo-de-loo a misaydangan minanam to sapisenataw to bangesan. sadikoday taloma' aca i nalecohan, i niyado' sato malamisaydan. malaheci ko sakay niw-doo 發明牛痘接種術 tawya a Ingkoo o tademaw ko sasapalan mitaneng , kasilahecian mangalay miala to i odipay a bena' no imelangay, o adidiay a sapisenad no katini' ko sapinanam i banges no imelangay. i nanikinkiwan a imelangay no tademaw caay kaw no nikalalidan to bala'an, sisa hatidaay to no tademaw caay to ka hacica ko tahekalay no ten-hoa. oyniyan ni tanengan yadah henay ko la'cosay, o nitanengan a tademaw ositin-hoaay a tademaw, sisa idaw ko mapatayay. no nitanengan a tademaw kapahto ko odip sa, nika amica ko nikakapah milalid to tepalay a tademawan, sisa kanca aidaw ko laa'd sa. . tawyaay a niyado' no Ingkoo idaw ko nakamoan sa, ano namalalidto to niw-doo, acaay to ka lalid to ten-hoa. no mipoleciay to coco no katalan a tataynaan no tademaw namalaliday namin to libongay to niw-doo. ci Cen-na ano tatengan ko kamo no i hekalay a tademaw, o niw-doo ato ten-hoa o malecaday sa, ano mahida nanicocokan to niw-doo taneng cocokan to ten-hoa o kapahay ko mahiniay sa. . nikahinian anipatahekalan, caypic- siwnem mihcaan lima a bolad caysip a dimiad, ci Cen-na malingato to mikinkiw to niw-doo a kawawan. cinida micocok to niw-doo a kawawan, sakapahen nida ko nipibanaw to katini' itidan nida i waloay a mihcaan nanay a wawaw ci Cen-mose. Faipo-se to tosaay a abalaan, banaten nida paladoka, pacomoden nida to niw-doo, metalaw asiten-hoa. namalalid sato kida tatamaan a wawa to niw-doo, enemay a lalipayan mangaay to. nikoda ci Cen-na cocokan naca nida kida tatamaan a wawa to ten-hoa, alaw caay ka lalid kida tatamaan a wawa to libongan, itini palotatengan cinida o niw-doo mikapah to ten-hoa maconos ko kapah no odip. (James Phipps) . ci Cen-na matineng to toyo nipicocokan to libong nikasilahecian, mangalay ci nida to nika cacayan a demiad malawpes ko ten-hoa i tini i kitakidan. tahsepi han nida masasoini namin misaicelang ko kitakiday a tademaw sadikoday malaheci to, caysiw-walsep mihcaan ina ten-hoa lawpes sato itini i kitakida. . doma a nipain其它貢獻 nipikinkiwan to niw-doo a sacocok, ci Cen-na o manamohay miadih to sakalihalay to hekal a kesya-ciw. wawa nina to-con a ayam matineng mialaw to doma no ayaman a ti'kok ato wawa no doma a ayam micodoh patahekal, ci Cen-na to ko makaadihay. no nipihaymawan nida miadih, sisa ci Cen-na maadih no Ing-koo hon-ciw-sye-hoa itida i caypic-walsiw mihcaan mala yen-se. .
